member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.XamPivotDataSlicer.RegisterResources(System.String,System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Adds an additonal Resx file in which the control will pull its resources from.
member.param: The name of the embedded resx file that contains the resources to be used.
The assembly in which the resx file is embedded.
member.remarks: Don't include the extension of the file, but prefix it with the default Namespace of the assembly.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.XamPivotDataSlicer.UnregisterResources(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a previously registered resx file.
member.param: The name of the embedded resx file that was used for registration.
member.remarks: Note: this won't have any effect on controls that are already in view and are already displaying strings. It will only affect any new controls created.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.XamPivotDataSlicerPlaceholder
member.summary: The designer needs a class which doesn't inherit from control in order to work, otherwise there are compilation problems due to the base class (Control) being ambiguous between SL and WPF.
